title: Alaa A. Abdel Bary
summary: Alaa A. Abdel Bary is an Egyptian professor of mathematics at the Department of Basic & Applied Science Department, in the College of Engineering & Technology, at the Arab Academy for Science, Technology, & Maritime Transport, Alexandria, Egypt. He is theÂ  Vice President for Postgraduates Studies and Scientific Research, a former Vice President for Student Affairs and a former Dean of Student Affairs of the institution.[1][2]
